QuestData.Title: The Battle Is Won, The War Goes On
QuestData.Description: We've defeated the enemy's forces here, $n. But Hyjal is not the only place where our foes are moving against us.$B$BI've been informed that our allies in the Earthen Ring have put out a call for aid in a matter I've been assured is most critical.$B$BSpeak to Farseer Krogar at the Western Earthshrine in Orgrimmar for further instructions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Farseer Krogar at the Western Earthshrine in Orgrimmar.
